name: MindfulnessMinute
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mindfulness minute
Developer Terms of Use
des: Mindfulness Minute by iHeartRadio. You can set up this routine to play a daily guided meditation at a time of your convenience. Take a minute to gift yourself with some rejuvenating concentration, balancing your mind and body, and addressing stress, whether positive or negative. Feel the difference it makes to your day.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
